verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: He abides, He abides,

Hallelujah,
He abides with me!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I’m rejoicing
night and day,
as I walk the narrow way,
For the Comforter abides with me.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I’m rejoicing
night and day,
As I walk the pilgrim way,

For the hand of God
in all my life I see,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And the reason of my bliss,
Yes, the secret
all is this:

That the Comforter
abides with me.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Once my heart
was full of sin,
once I had no peace within,

Till I heard how Jesus
died upon the tree;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Then I fell down
at His feet,
and there came a peace so sweet,

Now the Comforter
abides with me.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
He is with me everywhere,
and He knows my every care,

I’m as happy as a bird
and just as free;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
For the Spirit has control,
Jesus satisfies my soul,

Since the Comforter
abides with me.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
There’s no thirsting
for the things
of the world
they’ve taken wings;

Long ago I gave them up,
and instantly

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
All my night
was turned to day,
All my burdens rolled away,

Now the Comforter
abides with me.
